text: ai logo, jo eemaan lae ho! na purushon ka koee giroh doosare purushon kee hansee udae, sambhav hai ve unase achchhe hon aur na striyaan striyon kee hansee udae, sambhav hai ve unase achchhee hon, aur na apanon par taane kaso aur na aapas mein ek-doosare ko buree upaadhiyon se pukaaro. eemaan ke pashchaat avagyaakaaree ka naam judana bahut hee bura hai. aur jo vyakti baaz na aae, to aise hee vyakti zaalim hai
